task.title: Attach a volume to an instance using the User Console

taskbody.context: In this section of the lab you will attach a volume to a running instance using the Eucalyptus User Console.

step.cmd: In the User Console in the Manage volumes window, click the check box next to the volume to select the volume.
In the Manage volumes window, click More actions and select Attach to instance.

info.p: The Attach volume to instance window opens.

step.cmd: In the Attach volume to instance window, type i- to open a drop-down menu with a list of running instances. Select your running instance from the list. Change the default device name to /dev/vdb, and click Attach.
In the Manage volumes window, notice that the volume is attached to the instance. You might need to click Refresh to see the updated information.
Remain logged in to the User Console.
